Articles.Content:
super docking changeling

after there landing on the mun Bill and Jeb thought it would be a good idea to try and go to Duna(they left bob behind)

not having enough fuel they barely got in to interplanetary space

your mission is to go and rescue them and bring them home

Rules

1. no mods

2. stock parts only

3.use save file provided

4.use a crewed vehicle to rescue them

How to win

there is no part limit on this challenge but to win you must do this challenge in the shortest time possible

Hard mode

land with in 3km of the launch pad and every part of your ship adds two seconds to your total time

optional

rescue bob

post your times below (and if you are doing hard mode count the parts) also post how many parts you used

have fun

here is the link to the save file

http://www./folder/x422w08n6gk0o/Super_docking_chalange

Have fun:cool:

Edited August 8, 2013 by krob99

read the challenge thread rules, as to attempt this you'r self as well.

not to mention this is an easy challenge to most kerbal veterans and as you have not banned mods they are still allowed so anyone could just hyper edit this.
(yeah i just hyperedited this challenge )
This is a bad challenge (see the rules), but there shouldn't be any expectation that Hyper Edit teleportation is valid anywhere on this forum.

read the challenge thread rules, as to attempt this you'r self as well.

The rules say nothing about actually posting your own attempt. Just to not post impossible challenges

Is this challenge possible?

Many challenges we see are nearly or literally impossible to achieve, and usually very little thought has gone into them, these challenges just annoy people, waste forum space and show that the submitter hasn't really tried.

So test your challenge yourself first to make sure it is possible, you don't have to be successful but you'll soon know if the challenge has a hope of being completed.
